raw_text: RODRIGO – DR WEDAGE DANTHA – (President’s Counsel,​ Former Principal of Sri Lanka Law College),​ beloved husband of Mrs P. Chandra Perera (Attorney-at-Law) and beloved father of Mr Wedage Oshada Rodrigo (Attorney-at-Law),​ beloved brother of Mrs Thilaka Ranasinghe,​ Mr Nimal Rodrigo,​ Mr Sarath Rodrigo and late Mr Gamini Rodrigo,​ passed away. Funeral ritual will be held at Madampitiya General Cemetery,​ Colombo on the 18th of October 2023 at 3.00 p.m. We will leave home at 2 p.m.066530
